import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' const Contact = ({ onAddContact }) => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); let history = useHistory(); const onSubmit = (data) => { Swal.fire( 'Created!', 'Your file has been created.', 'success' ) onAddContact(data); history.push("/admin/categories"); }; return (
